function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unreliable self-reported symptom onset for COVID-19 infection","Impact":"Inaccurate detection of COVID-19 cases and potential spread of the infection","Mitigation":"Implement regular testing and use of more reliable diagnostic methods","Technologies":"Improved diagnostic tests and contact tracing technology","People":"Asymptomatic individuals, public health","Owner":"Public health organizations, healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Overfitting of algorithmic detection methods (ADMs)","Impact":"Inflated performance and inaccurate identification of COVID-19 cases","Mitigation":"Use of cross-validation techniques and diverse training data","Technologies":"Machine learning algorithms, cross-validation methods","People":"Developers of ADMs, public health organizations","Owner":"Developers, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Challenges in conducting diagnostic test accuracy systematic review","Impact":"Lack of standardized accuracy measures and validation standards","Mitigation":"Establishment of uniform validation standards and reporting guidelines","Technologies":"Review protocols and guidelines for diagnostic testing","People":"Researchers, regulatory agencies","Owner":"Research institutions, regulatory agencies"}]}
